Observed at: Jasper Warden Station 9:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to a few flurries overnight. Snow level 2200 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
